thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 11 of 265
thread.title: Justine

author: Justine
title: Justine
text: I have been cooking with HelloFresh for about a month now...My husband and I are emptynesters for quite some time now and I was getting so tired of trying to figure out what to make for 2 every evening than I was introduced to HelloFresh by a friend. We LOVE IT! This is so perfect for 2 people...the portions are pretty good, the meals are easy to prepare and I love coming home and having my meal all ready to cook in one easy box, 30 minutes and we have a delicious meal. I highly recommend HelloFresh!
